snippet: The press, which the designer William Morris used to produce “The Works of Geoffrey Chaucer,” was acquired by the Rochester Institute of Technology for its Cary Graphic Arts Collection.
abstract: The press, which the designer William Morris used to produce “The Works of Geoffrey Chaucer,” was acquired by the Rochester Institute of Technology for its Cary Graphic Arts Collection.

headline.main: English Hand Press Used by Designer William Morris Is Sold for $233,000
